医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究深入了解美国妈妈在出生后一年所面临的挑战美国的孕产妇死亡率正在上升，一半以上的孕产妇死亡发生在产后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-provides-insights-into-the-challenges-faced-by-American-moms-in-the-year-after-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Study-provides-insights-into-the-challenges-faced-by-American-moms-in-the-year-after-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44aa7804-efcc-4c97-b4b1-f45186442236 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 21:06:47 -0500 Study provides insights into the challenges faced by American moms in the year after birth
陈亚兵获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款以推进血管疾病研究陈亚冰博士获得了美国国立卫生研究院的两项总计超过 500 万美元的资助，用于进一步研究从动脉硬化到痴呆等血管疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Yabing-Chen-receives-NIH-grants-to-advance-angio-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Yabing-Chen-receives-NIH-grants-to-advance-angio-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18c1e677-ebb7-47b2-979d-a2cf5e31aadb Mon, 06 Nov 2023 20:54:44 -0500 Yabing Chen receives NIH grants to advance vascular disease research
靶向药物或可为复发性血癌患者提供新的治疗选择俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心 – Arthur G. James 癌症医院和 Richard J. Solove 研究所 (OSUCCC – James) 的研究人员研究了一种新的靶向药物，可能为血癌（包括慢性血癌）患者提供新的治疗选择淋巴细胞白血病 (CLL) 和非霍奇金淋巴瘤 (NHL) 的疾病对标准治疗已不再有反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Targeted-drug-may-offer-a-new-treatment-option-for-病人-with-relapsed-blood-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Targeted-drug-may-offer-a-new-treatment-option-for-病人-with-relapsed-blood-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=929b804c-b8b7-43a7-bb5d-9dac508e4c38 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 20:49:42 -0500 Targeted drug may offer a new treatment option for patients with relapsed blood cancer
研究人员确定了 SARS-CoV-2 的“免疫阈值”针对 COVID-19，我们需要多少免疫力？由爱尔兰科学家领导并发表在《自然通讯》上的新国际研究确定了 SARS-CoV-2 的“免疫阈值”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Researchers-identify-a-Threshold-of-Immunity-to-SARS-CoV-2.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Researchers-identify-a-Threshold-of-Immunity-to-SARS-CoV-2.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9481db9-9a8b-4ffa-af8f-0cb0b052795d Mon, 06 Nov 2023 20:31:00 -0500 Researchers identify a 'Threshold of Immunity' to SARS-CoV-2
启动新调查以改善全球烧伤护理人们被要求完成一项在线调查，以帮助确定全球烧伤研究的十大重点并改善世界各地的烧伤护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-survey-launched-to-improve-burns-care-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-survey-launched-to-improve-burns-care-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e215ebd-4b8c-428f-aed8-de31112e8cae Mon, 06 Nov 2023 20:27:39 -0500 New survey launched to improve burns care worldwide
转向慢性炎症性疾病的个性化治疗方法慢性炎症性疾病影响着 5% 至 7% 的人口，无论年龄或性别，从儿童到老年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Shifting-towards-personalized-treatment-approaches-for-chronic-itis-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Shifting-towards-personalized-treatment-approaches-for-chronic-itis-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aee4ae58-675c-46a9-9dab-c6b274dbe896 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 20:15:57 -0500 Shifting towards personalized treatment approaches for chronic inflammatory diseases
具有体力活动遗传倾向的个体心血管危险因素较少于韦斯屈莱大学运动与健康科学学院进行的一项研究发现，具有较高体力活动遗传倾向的个体患心血管疾病的危险因素较少，患高血压、脑血管疾病和心脏病的风险也较低。 2型糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Individuals-with-genic-predisposition-for-physical-activity-have-fewer-cardioangio-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Individuals-with-genic-predisposition-for-physical-activity-have-fewer-cardioangio-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad33493e-73e9-44c7-9312-1c79b283c8a2 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 20:04:03 -0500 Individuals with genetic predisposition for physical activity have fewer cardiovascular risk factors
发现与厌恶和抑郁有关的神经回路研究人员发现大脑中有一种新的神经回路，当激活时会产生强烈的不适感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Neural- Circuit-linked-to-aversion-and-depression-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Neural- Circuit-linked-to-aversion-and-depression-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81c6d848-ee4d-4009-b9e5-19f15b402df8 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 19:57:49 -0500 Neural circuit linked to aversion and depression discovered
可穿戴技术有助于改善农业工作条件AgWearCare 项目利用可穿戴设备来收集数据并将其数字化，支持农业任务并预防与工作相关的肌肉骨骼疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Wearable-technology-helps-to-improve-working-conditions-in-agriculture.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Wearable-technology-helps-to-improve-working-conditions-in-agriculture.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc19464b-a453-4616-a07e-1ed3f6e462a2 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 19:40:00 -0500 Wearable technology helps to improve working conditions in agriculture
Telomouse模型为深入的衰老和癌症研究提供了宝贵的资源研究人员介绍了“Telomouse”。通过对标准实验室小鼠进行微妙的基因改变，他们使保护染色体末端的端粒与人类的端粒更加相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Telomouse-model-provides-a-valuable-resource-for-in-depth-aging-and-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Telomouse-model-provides-a-valuable-resource-for-in-depth-aging-and-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b75228ff-9716-4361-8855-6422b1796e95 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 19:33:32 -0500 Telomouse model provides a valuable resource for in-depth aging and cancer research
